title: Vanilla Maple Cashew Butter
directions: Add the cashews to a food processor and process until creamy and smooth. This may take up to 5 â€“ 7 minutes for it to change from a nut, to flour to nut butter, but stop every minute or so to scrape the sides.
Add the remaining ingredients: vanilla extract, maple syrup and coconut oil and process again until everything is well blended and creamy.
Store in an air-tight container in the refrigerator.
